name: Plugin Monitor
author: Abdul Hadi

sections.description: Introducing Plugin Monitor: your ultimate solution for seamless plugin management. Stay informed about your plugin ecosystem with real-time insights, manage & optimize WordPress plugins, last used versions, & also receive timely email notifications tailored to your plugin activities for peak efficiency.
sections.installation:
Installation is fairly straight forward. Install it from the WordPress plugin repository.

Plugin Monitor need your support

To sustain the development of our plugin, we rely on contributions. If you find our Plugin Monitor useful, please consider making a donation. Your support fuels ongoing improvements, ensuring a robust and user-friendly experience.

Plugin Documentation

  • Video Tutorial (Include soon!)
  • Need Help?

Features

Include soon!

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.2

  • Resolved issue with API access permission authentication.
  • Corrected tracking of plugin data during updates and installations.

Version 1.1.1

  • Updated plugin structure to utilize React framework.
  • Implemented plugin search functionality.
  • Added feature to download plugin data as a CSV file.

Version 1.0.1

  • Changed plugin name.

Version 1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
